parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Waypoints

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Gets the radius around the waypoint where the waypoint is completed.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''waypointCompletionRadius''' waypoint

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> waypoint:  [[Array]] - format [[Waypoint]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_radius <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[waypointCompletionRadius]] [groupOne, 1];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[waypoints]], [[setWaypointCompletionRadius]]
</value></part></template>
